answers.answer: The rls was the worst for me.  The hot Epsom salt baths helped.  I also found a supplement Natural Calm which is a magnesium powder mix that really helped me sleep.  It is also for anti-anxiety so I still use it in the evenings when I feel I need help winding down. Honestly the rls lasted for me for a few weeks, getting a bit better after about the first 7 days. Yes, everybody is different though. You can get through this and you will be so proud when you are done with the physical WD's.  Keep moving forward!Happy Be-lated Mother's Day to you!
